Finc Research Company is a Boutique consulting firm specialising in high quality research and software engineering.

We consult in :

-   Trial Design for life sciences research and regulatory submissions
-   R language adoption
-   Statistics and Data Science
-   Research Software

We perform :

-   Statistical support and analyses 
-   Build research software for your ecosystem
